Main Components (artview.components)Â¶

ARTview offer some basic Components for visualisation of data using Py-ART.

Display(Vradar, Vfield, Vtilt[, Vlims, ...]) Class that creates a display plot, using a returned Radar structure
Menu(pathDir[, filename, Vradar, Vgrid, ...]) Class to display the MainMenu
TiltButtonWindow(Vtilt[, Vradar, Vgrid, ...]) Class to display the Window with Tilt Buttons.
FieldButtonWindow(Vradar, Vfield[, name, parent]) Class to display the Window with Field Buttons
ComponentsControl([components, name, parent]) Class instance for control variables shared between components.
